name: 林煜善
objective: This course is designed to improve your listening and reading competence in English. You should be able to learn how to enhance your listening for each part and your reading speed. After taking this course, you will be able to acquire the competence and useful strategies on dealing with each part of the TOEIC test. You are also expected to get a score above 550. Please pay attention to the skills related to the TOEIC test. There will be two-round full skill in-class training by midterm and by final respectively. Should you have any questions, feel free to ask during the lecture.
